build-type.name: build
build-type.description: builds app, runs unit tests and functional tests against live server

parameters.param: #! /bin/bash export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.envs export VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 source /usr/local/bin/virtualenvwrapper.sh workon formalign pip install -r requirements.txt
#! /bin/bash export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.envs export VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 source /usr/local/bin/virtualenvwrapper.sh workon formalign cp $HOME/settings/settings.json ./ flake8 .

#! /bin/bash export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.envs export VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 source /usr/local/bin/virtualenvwrapper.sh workon formalign cp $HOME/settings/settings.json ./ python manage.py collectstatic --no-input -c --settings=settings_admin python manage.py makemigrations --settings=settings_admin python manage.py migrate --settings=settings_admin python manage.py test --settings=settings_admin --exclude-dir=acceptance_tests --with-coverage --cover-package=base,helper_funcs --cover-html --with-xunit

#! /bin/bash export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.envs export VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 source /usr/local/bin/virtualenvwrapper.sh workon formalign cp $HOME/settings/settings_live_server.json ./settings.json python manage.py behave --tags ~@skip --no-skipped --junit --settings=settings_admin
